# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input, r"\s+")
    output = join(words[1], " ")
    current_width = length(words[1])
    for i in 2:length(words)
        if current_width + 1 + length(words[i]) > text_width
            output *= "\n" * words[i]
            current_width = length(words[i])
        else
            output *= " " * words[i]
            current_width += 1 + length(words[i])
        end
    end
    return output
end

wrap_string("This is an example of wrapping text at a certain width", text_width=15)
```
